data.message: Better when you were a drunk on drugs, now your just a Hillary supporter.

replies.message: He never said he supported Hillary. He called Trump a hypocrite for doing what he accused her of doing...And then some.
Kimberly LeGrand Trump is the best fuking thing that Happened to America.  This fake ass sellout told us to choose a side, well fuk sake it aint EM's side.
Edwin Hillenbrand he also called us fucking retards on criminal on the mmlp :'(((( how bad did that hurt your feelings?
Edwin Hillenbrand he didnt ask you to choose a side. he straight said fck off..

Edwin Hillenbrand Em's still got more fans across all social media platforms than your stupid ass fake potus does. And no he's not my president. The last real President is Barack Obama. Trump will go down as an asterisk in history for the worst ever. And.... why are you even following him? I bet you'll be one of the first ones downloading his music tomorrow.
Kimberly LeGrand I didn't say he didn't have fans moron.  Just said he said to choose, I chose and won't be buying or listening anymore, thanks!

Lol this guy is probably going to say he dissed Trump so he lost me as a fan LOL AKA he drew the line and said f*** you guys he didn't lose you he threw you out of his life you remind me of that one b**** every guy breaks up with and she has to go on and say I broke up with him LOL b**** you're in denial such a b**** ass down and go back to sucking Trump's dick
